Replace any 'hours' or availability text with a response time notice such as 'We revert within 24–48 hours'.

requirements.text: Wire the enquiry/contact form so that on submission it composes and opens a mailto link to 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' pre-filled with the submitted name, email, and message as the email body and subject. This should use a mailto: URI approach since no backend email service is available.

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form opens the user's email client with 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' as the recipient
The pre-filled email subject and body include the submitted name, email address, and message
The success confirmation message is still shown after the form is submitted

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Do not add any backend email service or third-party email API — use mailto: URI for form submission
nonGoals: Adding any new sections or pages to the website
Changing the visual design, colour palette, or typography
Implementing server-side email sending or a backend mailer
Modifying the navbar or any section other than ContactSection and Footer
